cause.description:
Help those who can't hear the sweet sounds in the world!Help them hear planes and cars and music. Help them hear the sounds of birds and bees and wind. Help them hear the sound of the rain falling or just help them hear the sound of our voice talking to them! Join the group and HELP TO HEAR!
1. HELP TO HEAR
2. they need to listen
cause.mission: Help those who cant hear be able to hear
cause.name: Deaf And Hearing Foundation
